text: You feel whole, if only for a moment.
An intangible warmth provides respite to your tired mind.
You recover a piece of what you are.
Encouraging whispers bring clarity to your mind.
Your will falters under the weight of your burdens.
Sorrow wells up from deep within your heart.
Suddenly the world feels a little duller.
Your every movement feels like a chore.
Fleeting voices become the judges of your actions.
